channel.title: Sabayon Linux Online Repository Status
channel.description: Keep you updated on what's going on in the Sabayon Linux Repository.

item.description: net-misc/dropbox-cli-1.6.0-r1~0: Cli interface for dropbox (python), part of nautilus-dropbox

item.description: x11-misc/sxlock-1.1~0: Simple screen locker utility for X, fork of sflock, which is based on slock. Main difference is that sxlock uses PAM authentication, so no suid is needed.
item.title: Added/Updated : Sabayon Linux 5 Standard :: Revision: 3 :: Automatic update

item.description: x11-misc/xss-lock-0.3.0_p20140302-r1~0: Use external locker as X screen saver
